data.title: What's your favorite Clancy series?
data.meta_description: Personally, I have always loved the Splinter Cell games but I'm not sure how this new one is shaping up. Always was really into Rainbow Six too until

#25 Edited By RIP_Icewood

I gotta go with the first Tom Clancy game I played, the original Splinter Cell. That game blew me away with its graphics and gameplay. It showed what the original xbox could do. Chaos Theory (one of my favorite games EVER) improved on the gameplay and really took advantage of the Xbox graphics wise. Not to mention the story is pretty sick. Im very very dissappointed with Ubisoft for what their doing with Conviction if that game ever sees the light of day.

#26 Edited By JoelTGM

Used to love the splinter cell series, but then they messed with it. I also used to enjoy the ghost recon series, but then they messed with that. Oh, and rainbow six was awesome, but they messed with that too (cheesy arcade shooter in vegas... what a joke!).
